verses.name: Amos 9:9
verses.text: For, lo, I will command, and I will sift the house of Israel among all nations, like as corn is sifted in a sieve, yet shall not the least grain fall upon the earth.

verses.name: Amos 9:10
verses.text: All the sinners of my people shall die by the sword, which say, The evil shall not overtake nor prevent us.

verses.name: Amos 9:11
verses.text: In that day will I raise up the tabernacle of David that is fallen, and close up the breaches thereof; and I will raise up his ruins, and I will build it as in the days of old:
